New - Parts Sample Free Not Approved %28Standard and Non-Standard%29
rules.description: If the free request is not approved then change the stage to 'Non-Paid Declined'.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Non-paid Request'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample - Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(freeApproved__c, 'No'), ISCHANGED(freeApproved__c) )

rules.fullName: New - Parts Sample Submit For Approval
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'New'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample Request'), NOT(isPreBuild__c), (submitForApproval__c = TRUE), ISCHANGED(submitForApproval__c), (OR(numberCmLocations__c <> 1, ISNULL(numberCmLocations__c))), (OR(NOT(isPhyllo__c), AND(isPhyllo__c,NOT(ISBLANK(SpecId__c))))) )

rules.fullName: New - Parts Sample Submit For Approval - Pricing Assignment
rules.description: handle generic (no spec) phyllo/CBG product. Go from New to Pricing Assignment when submitted for approval.
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'New'), RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample Request', isPhyllo__c, ISCHANGED(submitForApproval__c), submitForApproval__c, ISBLANK( SpecId__c ) )

rules.fullName: New - Parts Sample Submit For Approval - RSM Approval
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'New'), RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample Request', isPreBuild__c, ISCHANGED(submitForApproval__c), submitForApproval__c )

rules.fullName: New - Parts Sample Submit For Approval - Skip CM
rules.description: Handle samples that have a spec and only 1 CM location specified to go from New to Pricing Assignment
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'New'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample Request'), NOT(isPreBuild__c), (submitForApproval__c = TRUE), ISCHANGED(submitForApproval__c), (numberCmLocations__c = 1), (OR(NOT(isPhyllo__c), AND(isPhyllo__c,NOT(ISBLANK(SpecId__c))))))

rules.fullName: New - Parts Sample Submit For Customer Quotation %28Standard or Non-Standard%29
rules.description: Submit for Customer Quotation for either path (Standard or Non-Standard).
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Pricing Assignment'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample - Submitted'), (pricingAssignmentComplete__c = TRUE), ISCHANGED(pricingAssignmentComplete__c) )

rules.fullName: New - Parts Sample Submit For Non-Paid Request %28Standard and Non-Standard%29
rules.description: If the Customer has rejected the Quote then set the stage to 'Non-Paid Request'.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Customer Decision'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample - Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(Customer_Quote_Decision__c, 'Rejected'), ISCHANGED(Customer_Quote_Decision__c) )

rules.fullName: New - Parts Sample Submit For Non-paid Declined %28Standard and Non-Standard%29
rules.description: If it can't be free then close the Sample request.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Non-paid Request'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample - Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(requestFreeSample__c, 'No'), ISCHANGED(requestFreeSample__c) )

rules.fullName: New - Parts Sample Submit For Order Pending %28Standard and Non-Standard%29
rules.description: Submit for Order Pending for either path (Standard or Non-Standard).
rules.formula: OR( (AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Customer Decision'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample - Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(Customer_Quote_Decision__c, 'Accepted'), ISCHANGED(Customer_Quote_Decision__c) )), (AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Non-paid Request'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample - Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(requestFreeSample__c, 'YES'), ISPICKVAL(freeApproved__c, 'YES'), ISCHANGED(freeApproved__c) )))

rules.fullName: New - Raw%2FConcore Sample Cancel Request
rules.description: Cancel the Sample request if the PLM doesn't approve it.
rules.formula: OR( (AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Commercial Assessment'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Raw Glass/Concore Sample - Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(commercialApproved__c, 'No'), ISCHANGED(commercialApproved__c) )), (AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'PLM Assessment'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Raw Glass/Concore Sample - Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(plmApproved__c, 'No'), ISCHANGED(plmApproved__c) )))

rules.fullName: New - Raw%2FConcore Sample Free Not Approved
rules.description: Set to 'Non-paid Declined' if the free request is not approved.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Non-paid Request'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Raw Glass/Concore Sample - Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(freeApproved__c, 'No'), ISCHANGED(freeApproved__c) )

rules.fullName: New - Raw%2FConcore Sample Submit For Approval
rules.description: Submit a Raw/Concore Sample request for approval.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'New'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Raw Glass/Concore Sample Request'), (submitForApproval__c = TRUE), ISCHANGED(submitForApproval__c), (countOpportunityLineItems__c < 20) )

rules.fullName: New - Raw%2FConcore Sample Submit For Customer Quotation
rules.description: Submit Raw/Concore Sample request for Customer Quotation.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'PLM Assessment'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Raw Glass/Concore Sample - Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(plmApproved__c, 'YES'), ISCHANGED(plmApproved__c) )

rules.fullName: New - Raw%2FConcore Sample Submit For Order Pending
rules.description: Submit Raw/Concore Sample request for Order Pending.
rules.formula: OR( (AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Customer Decision'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Raw Glass/Concore Sample - Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(Customer_Quote_Decision__c, 'Accepted'), ISCHANGED(Customer_Quote_Decision__c) )), (AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Non-paid Request'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Raw Glass/Concore Sample - Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(requestFreeSample__c, 'YES'), ISPICKVAL(freeApproved__c, 'YES'), ISCHANGED(freeApproved__c) )))

rules.fullName: New - Raw%2FConcore Sample Submit For PLM Assessment
rules.description: Submit Raw/Concore Sample request for PLM Assessment.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Commercial Assessment'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Raw Glass/Concore Sample - Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(commercialApproved__c, 'Yes'), ISCHANGED(commercialApproved__c) )

rules.fullName: New - Raw%2FConfore Sample Submit For Non-paid Declined
rules.description: Set to 'Non-paid Declined' if the free request is not attempted.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Non-paid Request'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Raw Glass/Concore Sample - Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(requestFreeSample__c, 'No'), ISCHANGED(requestFreeSample__c) )

rules.fullName: New - Sample Approval for Non-Paid Request
rules.description: If the opportunity owner sets request free sample to "Yes", and it has been approved. Set the stage to 'Order Pending'.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISCHANGED(freeApproved__c), ISPICKVAL(requestFreeSample__c, 'YES'), ISPICKVAL(freeApproved__c, 'YES') )

rules.fullName: New - Sample Request Order Pending Notification
rules.description: Send an email when a parts Sample reaches the 'Order Pending' stage
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), OR((RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample - Submitted'),(RecordType.Name = 'GG Raw Glass/Concore Sample - Submitted')), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Order Pending'), ISCHANGED(StageName), Account.Name != 'Blue', NOT(isPhyllo__c) )

rules.fullName: New - Sample Request Order Pending Notification - Blue
rules.description: Send an email when a parts Sample reaches the 'Order Pending' stage
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), OR( (RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample - Submitted'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Raw Glass/Concore Sample - Submitted')), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Order Pending'), ISCHANGED(StageName), Account.Name = 'Blue' )

rules.fullName: New - Sample Request Order Pending Notification - Phyllo
rules.description: Send an email when a parts Sample reaches the 'Order Pending' stage and the product is phyllo
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), OR((RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample - Submitted'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Raw Glass/Concore Sample - Submitted') ), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Order Pending'), ISCHANGED(StageName), Account.Name != 'Blue', isPhyllo__c )

rules.fullName: New - Sample Submit For Non-Paid Request
rules.description: If the opportunity owner sets request free sample to "Yes", set the stage to 'Non-Paid Request'.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(requestFreeSample__c, 'Yes'), ISCHANGED(requestFreeSample__c) )

rules.fullName: New - Sample request pricing complete note
rules.description: Send an email to opportunity owner when sample request pricing is completed by PLM.
rules.formula: OR( (AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Customer Quotation'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample - Submitted'), (pricingAssignmentComplete__c = TRUE), ISCHANGED(pricingAssignmentComplete__c) )), (AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Customer Quotation'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Raw Glass/Concore Sample - Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(requestFreeSample__c, 'YES'), ISPICKVAL(plmApproved__c, 'YES'), ISCHANGED(plmApproved__c) )))

rules.fullName: New - Update Sample Approval Date
rules.formula: OR( (AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Order Pending'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Parts Sample - Submitted'), ISCHANGED(StageName) )), (AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Name)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Order Pending'), (RecordType.Name = 'GG Raw Glass/Concore Sample - Submitted'), ISCHANGED(StageName) )))

rules.fullName: Parts Cancelled Notification
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL( StageName,'Cancelled'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),'Order Pending'), OR( RecordTypeId = '0121J000000U1cX', RecordTypeId = '0121J000000U1cY', RecordTypeId = '0121J000000U1cb', RecordTypeId = '0121J000000U1ca') )
